data.title: Best time to visit Zagreb: Weather and Temperatures. 5 months to avoid! - Croatia
data.meta_description: The climate is unfavourable 5 months out of 12 in Zagreb. Don't get there the wrong period! Discover the best time to go to have a perfect weather.
data.text:
Best time to go to Zagreb Average weather of Zagreb, Croatia

When is the best time to go to Zagreb?

When is the best time to go to Zagreb? Here's some information to help you in your decision:

The best months for good weather in Zagreb are April, May, June, July, August and September

On average, the warmest months are July and August

January is the coldest month of the year

The rainiest months are May and June

Annual weather in Zagreb

Weather details in Zagreb month by month

To get all the information about the climate and weather in Zagreb for a specific month, click on the corresponding link below:

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Weather and climate in Zagreb

Zagreb enjoys a temperate oceanic climate (with warm summer) in accordance with the Köppen-Geiger classification. The yearly average maximum temperature in Zagreb is 17°C (ranging from 4°C in january to 29°C in august). Annual rainfall is 1204mm, with a minimum of 66mm in december and a maximum of 159mm in may.

From january to march the climate is very unfavorable. By early evening, the temperature averages 7°C and it rains about 70mm each month.

Between april and september the climate is favorable. By early evening, the temperature averages 16°C and it rains in september about 124mm.

In the month of october the climate is correct. At lunchtime, it's 17°C in average and you can expect to have 99mm of rainfall/month during this period.

In november the climate is unfavorable. the thermometer goes up to 12°C°C and you can expect to have 108mm of rainfall/month during this period.

In december the climate is very bad. By early evening, the temperature averages 2°C and you can expect to have 66mm of rainfall/month during this period.

Charts: temperature and rainfall in Zagreb

In the charts below, you can see the following seasonal norms for the city of Zagreb: the minimum and maximum outdoor temperature, the risk and amount of monthly rainfall, daily average sunshine, and relative humidity for each month of the year.

Outside temperature

Precipitation (rainfall)

Daily sunshine hours

Humidity

Peak visitor numbers and tourist seasons in Zagreb

Find out when Zagreb has its high tourist season (the period when the influx of tourists is highest) and off-peak tourist season using our data and figures.

Tourist seasons in Zagreb

Very low season in Zagreb

The months with the lowest number of tourists are: January, February, March and November.

Low season in Zagreb

The months with low numbers of tourists are: April, October and December.

High season in Zagreb

The number of visitors to Zagreb is high in: May, June and September.

Peak season in Zagreb

The largest number of tourists visiting Zagreb is during: July and August.

Figure: Visitor index for Zagreb month by month

Best time for low prices in Zagreb

Average prices of hotels in Zagreb month by month

Generally, January is the month with the lowest hotel prices in Zagreb. So this is a great time to save on your holiday! In contrast, December is statistically the most expensive month of the year for hotels.

Find the best price for your hotel room

Average price for flights to Zagreb

A return flight between London and Zagreb is generally cheaper if you go in january ($ 78 on average): this is the best time for travellers on a tight budget. In contrast, you may end up paying $ 115 more for your airline ticket to Zagreb if you go in august.

Find the best price for your flight Flight prices to Zagreb

Average price of hiring a car in Zagreb

On average, it costs $ 23 per day to hire a car in Zagreb. This price varies by $ 33 depending on the month. In november, hiring a car costs an average of $ 14 per 24 hours, so this is the best time to save money! In contrast, the average price in july is $ 46.

Find the best price for your car rental
